Tables organization: Entities_[letter or not_alpha] entity_id: Primary key, Unique label: name of the entity description: Short description

Properties_relations Table entity_id: relationship of
relations: List of all relations

Aliases Table entity_id alias: Other labels.

Properties Table property_id Unique primary key
label:Description of the Property

{% raw %}

class WikiDatabase[source]

WikiDatabase()

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Testing

{% raw %} 
wiki = WikiDatabase()
start_time = time.time()
result = wiki.get_entity_by_label('Stephen Curry')
print('Query tool : {}'.format(time.time()- start_time))
print(type(result))
print(result)
wiki.exit_procedure()

<sqlite3.Connection object at 0x7f8cc3ba1210>
Query tool : 0.022501468658447266
<class 'list'>
[['Q5573861', 'Stephen Curry', 'Australian comedian and actor'], ['Q16167386', 'Stephen Curry', 'Wikimedia disambiguation page'], ['Q352159', 'Stephen Curry', 'American basketball player']]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
wiki = WikiDatabase()
result = wiki.get_entity_by_label('Bill Gates')
print(result)

<sqlite3.Connection object at 0x7f8cc3ba1210>

for property_r in wiki.get_entity_properties('Q5284'): 
    print(wiki.get_property_string(property_r[0], property_r[1]))
